allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add admin donations management system with comprehensive features

This commit implements a complete admin interface for managing donations:

- Admin donations listing page with tabbed interface (pending, approved, rejected, active, completed, all)
- Donation approval and rejection workflow with required rejection reasons
- Donor details modal showing comprehensive donor information
- Fixed foreign key relationship between donations and donors tables
- Added complete database type definitions for donations table
- Integration with admin dashboard showing donations statistics
- Server actions for approving and rejecting donations
- Proper use of service role client to bypass RLS policies

Additional improvements:
- Updated README with comprehensive system documentation
- Added ERD, DFD, Use Case, Sequence, and other UML diagrams
- Complete technology stack and deployment documentation
- Detailed user roles and workflows
EOF
)")
